tool_description: Query for stores, categories, products, etc ... as on official websites
title: Target

api_list.name: products/v3/get-details

required_parameters.name: tcin
required_parameters.description: The value of tcin field returned in .../products/v2/list or .../products/search-by-barcode endpoint

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: The value of location_id returned in .../stores/list endpoint

api_list.name: products/search-by-barcode

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: The value of location_id returned in â€¦/stores/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: barcode
required_parameters.description: The barcode

api_list.name: categories/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List all root and sub categories

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Used to list child categories, you need to parse the value of target field returned right in this endpoint, such as : ...?category=5xtg6

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://target1.p.rapidapi.com/categories/list"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "target1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: categories/v2/list
api_list.description: List all root and sub categories

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Used to list child categories, you need to parse the value of target field (taxonomy_nodes->actions->target) OR children->node_id returned right in this endpoint, such as : ...?category=5xtg6

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://target1.p.rapidapi.com/categories/v2/list"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "target1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: products/v2/list
api_list.description: List products in specific store with options and filters

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: You need to parse the value of target field returned in .../categories/list endpoint, such as : ...?category=o9rnh. Please notice that do NOT use keyword and category parameters together, keyword  OR category  is required.

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: The value of location_id returned in .../stores/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: faceted_value
optional_parameters.description: Look for suitable values returned under facet_list/details/value or facet_list/details/facet_id JSON object, separated by comma for multiple options, such as : 5tal2,q643lesaelr,etc...

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed relevance|newest|RatingHigh|bestselling|PriceLow|PriceHigh

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Search for products by term or phrase, such as : macbook air. Please notice that do NOT use searchTerm and endecaId parameters together, searchTerm  OR endecaId  is required.

optional_parameters.name: default_purchasability_filter
optional_parameters.description: Filter for purchasable items only

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose, maximum 20 items per page.

api_list.name: products/list-collection (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List whole collection relating to a product

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: The value of location_id returned in .../stores/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: tcin
required_parameters.description: The value of tcin field returned in .../products/list endpoint

api_list.name: products/list-recommended (Deprecated)

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: The value of location_id returned in .../stores/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: tcins
required_parameters.description: The value of tcin field returned in .../products/list endpoint

api_list.name: products/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List products in specific store with options and filters

required_parameters.name: endecaId
required_parameters.description: You need to parse the value of target field returned in .../categories/list endpoint, such as : ...?category=o9rnh. Please notice that do NOT use searchTerm and endecaId parameters together, searchTerm  OR endecaId  is required.

required_parameters.name: storeId
required_parameters.description: The value of location_id returned in .../stores/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: storeSearch
optional_parameters.description: Only search for In-store products

optional_parameters.name: facets
optional_parameters.description: Look for suitable values returned under facetView/Entry/ExtendedData/value JSON object, separated by comma for multiple options, such as : 5tal2,q643lesaelr,etc...

optional_parameters.name: searchTerm
optional_parameters.description: Search for products by term or phrase, such as : macbook air. Please notice that do NOT use searchTerm and endecaId parameters together, searchTerm  OR endecaId  is required.

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose, maximum 20 items per page.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed relevance|newest|RatingHigh|bestselling|PriceLow|PriceHigh

optional_parameters.name: pageNumber
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

api_list.name: products/v2/list-recommended

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: The value of location_id returned in .../stores/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: tcins
required_parameters.description: The value of tcin field returned in .../products/list endpoint

api_list.name: products/v2/get-details (Deprecated)

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: The value of location_id returned in .../stores/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: tcin
required_parameters.description: The value of tcin field returned in .../products/list endpoint

api_list.name: products/get-details (Deprecated)

required_parameters.name: tcin
required_parameters.description: The value of tcin field returned in .../products/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: The value of location_id returned in .../stores/list endpoint

api_list.name: reviews/v2/list
api_list.description: List reviews relating to a product

required_parameters.name: reviewedId
required_parameters.description: The value of tcin field returned in .../products/v2/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed most_recent|helpfulness_desc|highest_rating|lowest_rating

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: hasOnlyPhotos
optional_parameters.description: Only filter for reviews having photos

optional_parameters.name: verifiedOnly
optional_parameters.description: Only filter for verified reviews

optional_parameters.name: ratingFilter
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : rating_1|rating_2|...|rating_5. Pass this parameter multiple time to filter by multiple ratings. Ex : ...&ratingFilter=rating_4&ratingFilter=rating_5&...

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose, maximum items per page is 30

api_list.name: stores/get-details
api_list.description: Get detail information of specific store

required_parameters.name: location_id
required_parameters.description: The value of location_id returned in .../stores/list endpoint

api_list.name: stores/list
api_list.description: List available nearby store by zipcode, GEO location, or city name. One at a time, do NOT use them together at once.

required_parameters.name: zipcode
required_parameters.description: Zip code or postal code of area to look for stores, such as : 10009

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: Name of city to look for stores, such as : california

optional_parameters.name: latlng
optional_parameters.description: GEO location to look for around stores, such as : 36.839828,-119.727711

api_list.name: auto-complete
api_list.description: Get suggestion by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Any familiar term or phrase  to search for products

api_list.name: reviews/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List reviews relating to a product

required_parameters.name: tcin
required_parameters.description: The value of tcin field returned in .../products/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose, maximum items per page is 30

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed time_desc|helpfulness_desc|rating_desc|rating_asc
